page.title: 09WHITCHURCH POLICE
page.content: {To keep law and order}there are nine police cars, six police dogs based in Shrewsbury and two or three in Whitchurch.There is a red alert in the police station which is connected to all stations.There is a dark gloomy cell with windows made of steel and unbreakable glass.{The police station has 15 policemen and 1 policewoman. There are 21 people at the station.To join the police,you need 4 O levels. You have to be 19 before you can work in the town.To go into the C.I.D. you have to serve 5 years,then have a trial period.{There is a breathalyser to prevent people drunk driving.The police have leaflets to fill in if you see a robbery.They keep forms with pictures of criminals.{Each year 30 to {40}criminals are caught.If they see robbers get away,children should note down the car's registration number.
